name: Get Nukes
description:
Game Designed by: Francis E. Rosario
Game Tested by: Vanessa Rivera
• Favorite moment: Voice Lines. Como momentos en los cuales una voz se rie de ti sabiendo que vas a fallar el juego y sin querer te dice cuál es el botón que puedes presionar para salvarte.
• Changes you would make: It would slow down the Platforming as it is too fast. It would create a Health Point System so that the player had a better chance of winning.
• Was there anything about gameplay or mechanics that you didn't understand? I didn’t understand the Control Scheme. How to move a character.
• Describe the player's agency throughout the level: The character can move forward, backward, right and left and can jump.
• Additional feedback:
The game shows an office where the background includes science fiction items like power coils, huge tubes, lasers, and super computers. Everything is modeled in 3d.
